snippet: Trying to find “Borgen” is a little like trying to do arithmetic with the Red Queen in “Through the Looking Glass” — it can seem foolhardy to even try.
abstract: Ways for American viewers to see Danish television series Borgen listed.
lead_paragraph: Trying to find “Borgen” is a little like trying to do arithmetic with the Red Queen in “Through the Looking Glass” — it can seem foolhardy to even try.
